contact-us.title: (FR)Contact Us
contact-us.description: (FR)Our call centres and Service Canada Centres operate Monday to Friday, from 8:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., your local time. They are closed on statuary holidays.

call-us.title: (FR)Call us
call-us.description: (FR)You can reach us at either of the numbers below.

find-office.title: (FR)Find an office
find-office.description: (FR)Find a Service Canada Centre near you using the link below.

banner.title: (FR) Learn and plan for your retirement
banner.text: (FR) It’s never too early or too late to learn about your retirement options and plan for your future. Find out about public pensions, ways to save your money and tips to consider for your retirement income.

tabs.title: Learn (FR)
description: (FR) Learn about the "three pillars" of Canada's retirement system.
(FR) There are many factors to consider before retiring to help ensure that you can comfortably retire.

links.title: Sources of retirement income (FR)
links.description: (FR) Your income during retirement will typically come from three main sources

links.title: Financial Support (FR)
links.description: (FR) Learn about your different financial support options.
